General_Description: '''Marbled Morale''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Riddle: ''Search for the [[Suenites Quarry|Marble Quarry]] in [[Tavern Point]]. I was thrown down a pit along with the many bodies of exhausted [[slave]]s.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found and recovered the engraving.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
